data.comment: The match has started.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 2, Kevin Stott awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of LA Galaxy.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 6, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Los Angeles's half?
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
In the minute 11, Diego Rossi hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Los Angeles.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
In Los Angeles Los Angeles drive forward through Danny Musovski. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 14, Sacha Kljestan (LA Galaxy) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Los Angeles are pushing forward but Jose Cifuentes's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of LA Galaxy.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Los Angeles.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 25, LA Galaxy will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Los Angeles.
At Banc of California Stadium, Giancarlo Gonzalez is shown a red card and sent off.
Los Angeles drive upfield and Mohammed El Munir gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a LA Galaxy defender.
Eduard Atuesta (Los Angeles) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Guillermo Schelotto is making the team's first substitution at Banc of California Stadium with Nick DePuy replacing Yony Gonzalez.
Free kick in a good position for Los Angeles!
In the minute 32, Los Angeles's Mohammed El Munir misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Danny Musovski of Los Angeles smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Important block from the LA Galaxy defence as Mohammed El Munir fires in a strike for Los Angeles.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 39, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon breaks free at Banc of California Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
In the minute 41, Los Angeles pushes forward through Jose Cifuentes, whose finish on goal is saved.
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Los Angeles needs to be cautious. LA Galaxy have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 43, Danny Musovski (Los Angeles) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by LA Galaxy defenders.
Kevin Stott awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Kevin Stott signals a Los Angeles throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 50, In Los Angeles Los Angeles attack through Eduard Atuesta. The finish is off target, however.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 52, LA Galaxy are whistled for offside.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Jose Cifuentes (Los Angeles) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Los Angeles push forward at Banc of California Stadium and Eduard Atuesta gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined LA Galaxy defence.
Los Angeles apply pressure at Banc of California Stadium and Jose Cifuentes goes close with a header against the post.
In the minute 55, Kevin Stott signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to LA Galaxy's area.
Throw-in high up the field for LA Galaxy in Los Angeles.
Goal! Los Angeles have got their heads in front thanks to a Danny Musovski strike.
In the minute 58, Diego Rossi instrumental with a fine assist.
The home team have replaced Francisco Ginella with Latif Blessing. This is the first substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
Los Angeles make their second substitution with Diego Palacios replacing Jordan Harvey.
In the minute 62, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Los Angeles's Diego Rossi gets in a shot on goal at Banc of California Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Free kick LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy have a dangerous throw-in.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 65, Latif Blessing for Los Angeles gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
Kevin Stott awards the home team a throw-in.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Throw-in high up the field for Los Angeles in Los Angeles.
In the minute 68, Los Angeles are coming forward and Diego Rossi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
In the minute 68, Guillermo Schelotto (LA Galaxy) is making a second substitution, with Carlos Harvey replacing Jonathan Dos Santos.
At Banc of California Stadium, LA Galaxy are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 70, Bradley Wright-Phillips is on a sub for Danny Musovski for Los Angeles.
Carlos Vela is replacing Brian Rodriguez for the home team.
Kevin Stott signals a Los Angeles throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 71, Kevin Stott awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 75, LA Galaxy's Nick DePuy has been booked in Los Angeles.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 77, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Tristan Blackmon is replacing Jose Cifuentes for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Los Angeles's Mohammed El Munir gets his shot away but it misses the target.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Diego Palacios of Los Angeles gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
In the minute 80, Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Los Angeles.
Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Bradley Wright-Phillips for Los Angeles is whistled offside.
In the minute 85, The away team replace Julian Araujo with Joe Corona.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Kai Koreniuk is on a sub for Sebastian Lletget for LA Galaxy.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 88, LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
LA Galaxy are caught offside.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
At Banc of California Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Los Angeles's Carlos Vela gets in a shot but it is blocked by a LA Galaxy defender.
Diego Rossi for Los Angeles gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Kevin Stott awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Goal! Carlos Vela extends Los Angeles's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Bradley Wright-Phillips.
